definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Professor Hsiao highly recommended this book and provided detailed annotation on its organization and style.
sentences.chinese: 萧先生郑重推介此书，且逐词评说其章法体例。

sentences.english: As for the results, just leave it to the later generation to comment.
sentences.chinese: 至于成果，那就留于后人评说吧。

sentences.english: The same stage, there is inter-generational cross-border inter-Korean intercontinental people to note Pan Jinlian.
sentences.chinese: 同一舞台上，有跨朝跨代跨国跨洲的人来评说潘金莲。

definition: to appraise/to pass judgment on/to speak ill of/praise and censure/appraisal
don't pass judgment on a person's life until the lid is on the coffin (idiom)
to comment/a point by point commentary
don't pass judgment on a person's life until the lid is on the coffin (idiom)
The benevolent sees benevolence, the wise sees wisdom./Different views are admissible. (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 zhe3 jian4 ren2 , zhi4 zhe3 jian4 zhi4

definition: to make a definitive judgment/to come to a firm conclusion
lit. right and wrong, crooked and straight (idiom); fig. merits and demerits/pros and cons
to jump to an unfounded conclusion
